metadata.name: Creation Of A Local User Account
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new user account. Such accounts may be used for persistence that do not require persistent remote access tools to be deployed on the system.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sysadminctl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('adduser'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new user account. Such accounts may be used for persistence that do not require persistent remote access tools to be deployed on the system.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1136.001/T1136.001.md, https://ss64.com/osx/sysadminctl.html
